short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are here to help you to feel that your are not alone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Did You Know" tool that displays AEM Facts typically operates in the form of a browser extension or web-based service. It could be integrated with an algorithm that selects the most relevant and based on user preferences. Alternatively, users may also have the option to customize the tool by adding their own preferred AEM Facts

The benefits of this tool are numerous. For one, it offers a source of daily inspiration or motivation to help users stay positive and focused on their work. Additionally, it provides a break from monotonous work or routine activities and offers a means of learning new information or discovering different perspectives. Finally, it provides a sense of entertainment or amusement that can help to reduce stress and promote well-being.
